headline: Amex Exploration Announces Closing of C$34 Million Private Placement, Including Strategic Investment By Eldorado Gold
summary: Montreal, Quebec--(Newsfile Corp. - August 7, 2025) - Amex Exploration Inc. (TSXV: AMX) (FSE: MX0) (OTCQX: AMXEF) ("Amex" or the "Company") is pleased to announce that, due to strong investor demand, it has completed the first tranche of an oversubscribed non-brokered private placement, previously announced on July 17, 2025, for aggregate gross proceeds of C$34,246,800 (the "First Tranche"). The First Tranche was oversubscribed and exceeded the maximum size of the offering previously announced o

headline: AEG and American Express Expand Global Partnership, Growing More Than 20-Year Alliance Across Music, Sports, Ticketing and Live Entertainment
summary: LOS ANGELES, August 07, 2025--AEG and American Express renewed and expanded partnership across venues, festivals, touring, ticketing, sports with Amex as official payment partner
